data.title: Interview with Tae Lewis
data.meta_description: Artist Name: Tae Lewis Hometown: Goldsboro, North Carolina What project(s) are you currently working on? data.text:
Artist Name: Tae Lewis

Hometown: Goldsboro, North Carolina

What project(s) are you currently working on?

At the moment, i am working on my very first EP which is subject to be released in the late fall. This EP is taking me out of my comfort zone so that’s what’s so exciting about it.

What inspired you to pursue a career in music and when did you know?

Growing up, I have always been in a musical family. My father was my inspiration in wanting to pursue music. However, Dixie Chicks were the ones who inspired me to do country music.

If you weren’t pursuing a career in music, what would you be doing for a living?

If i wasn’t pursuing music, i would be attending law school. Being a family lawyer was always something that I wanted to do because i care so much about children and marriages.

What is your favorite downtime activity?

My downtime activity is playing the guitar and eating my favorite snacks.

Who is your biggest celebrity crush?

I actually don’t have one. Honestly, every celebrity that I have actually had a crush on have always showed me a different side of them that makes me not attracted to them anymore.

Who is your favorite sports team(s)?

My favorite sports team is The Los Angeles Lakers for Basketball. They have always been a favorite of mine.

What is the last movie that you watched?

The last movie I watched was School Dayz. I’ve watched this movie numerous times. This movie gives an honorable understanding for everyone on what happens throughout our generation.

What is the last album you listened to?

The last album I listened to was Maurice Moore’s debut album “The Amber Room” he’s an artist that is completely underrated.

If you could only listen to one album for the rest of your life, what would it be?

The album I could listen to for the rest of my life is Jimmie Allen album “Mercury Lane” it has so many hit songs that are completely timeless.

What is the greatest country song of all time?

My favorite country song of all time Is “love start slippin away” by Vince Gill

What has been your favorite city/town that you’ve visited out on the road?

My favorite city that I’ve been out on the road to is obviously Nashville. They know how to have a good time.

What is your favorite meal?

My favorite meal is Baked Chicken with Broccoli and seasoned Mashed Potatoes

Who is your dream duet partner?

My dream duet partner would be either Vince Gill or Jimmie Allen

Who would you like to go on tour with?

That’s a good question. I would love to go on tour with Luke Combs, Jimmie Allen, Maddie & Tae, and Chris Young.

What is your ultimate career goal(s)?

My ultimate career goal is to obviously be a country singer songwriter. However, I also want to implement a conference for helping individuals on branding and helping them with connections when they are extremely ready for work.
